title: Traptrix Pinguicula

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -If anybody visits you or your target, they will start to be digested.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Digested players ability fails the night after they become digested.
-Two nights after becoming digested, they lose their ability and it is given to Traptrix Pinguicula.
-Players are not informed of the Digestion or there ability failing.

desc:
Post 3276
*Why dont you just come over.. For a little bite?*
